channel.title: ░▒▓██████ ★ Fantura ★ Retro 2D RuneScape ★ ██████▓▒░
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lRHPqap.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CDHh8PG.png[/img] [size=20pt]★ Fantura ★[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/v86yIYS.png[/img]
Fantura is a unique 2d retro RuneScape server. This server was originally launched in January 2012, but has been re-released as of April 30, 2014. Join our world of custom quests, monsters and places. The reason this was posted here was to attract the old playerbase as well as new players. There are still a lot of things to be done, as when i put the server down it was still in Alpha. But i'll include a list of things we've done and things we haven't.
[b]Client Download:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/c3t0mqxe7ctu9q4/Fantura+0.92.zip]Here[/url]
[b]Quick video:[/b] [spoiler] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DTjb5aG3v4g[/youtube] [/spoiler]
Here is a list of completed and incompleted features. [spoiler]
█ = Completed █ = In progress █ = Not started
[b]Combat[/b]:
[ul][li]Magic[/li] [li]Melee[/li] [li]Ranged[/li] [li]Prayer[/li][/ul]
[b]Skills:[/b]
[ul][li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Hunter[/li] [li]RuneCrafting[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]Construction[/li] [li]Dungeoneering[/li] [li]Summoning[/li][/ul]
[/spoiler] [img]http://i.imgur.com/My7XmAS.png[/img]
This source uses Mirage 2.0 by touchofdeathproductions. Thanks for letting us use your source.

I can’t play[/quote]

If that doesn’t work, right click installer.exe and run it as administrator.

[center]


[size=20pt]★ Fantura ★[/size]

Fantura is a unique 2d retro RuneScape server. This server was originally launched in January 2012, but has been re-released as of April 30, 2014.
Join our world of custom quests, monsters and places. The reason this was posted here was to attract the old playerbase as well as new players.
There are still a lot of things to be done, as when i put the server down it was still in Alpha. But i’ll include a list of things we’ve done and things we haven’t.

Client Download: Here
